Uses of Interface
components.planningdetails.IPlanningDetailsState

  • Packages that use IPlanningDetailsState 
    Package Description
    components.planningdetails  

    • Uses of IPlanningDetailsState in components.planningdetails

      Classes in components.planningdetails that implement IPlanningDetailsState 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AddingWaypointState
      The AddingWaypointState state is used when the user is adding a new waypoint and is inputting the delivery duration and the time constraints (it is the state that comes after he choose an address with the map).
      class  DefaultState
      This is the default state of the PlanningDetails component.
      class  PlanningDetailsState
      This class acts as a basis to build the states of the planning details.
      class  SelectingWaypointState
      The SelectingWaypointState represents the state of the PlanningDetails when the use clicked on the "add" button to add a new waypoint and we are waiting for him to choose the address (Intersecion) where to add the new Waypoint.
      Methods in components.planningdetails that return IPlanningDetailsState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IPlanningDetailsState AddingWaypointState.enterState(IPlanningDetailsState previousState) 
      IPlanningDetailsState SelectingWaypointState.enterState(IPlanningDetailsState previousState) 
      IPlanningDetailsState PlanningDetailsState.enterState(IPlanningDetailsState previousState)
      This default method simply refreshes the view when entering to this state.
      IPlanningDetailsState IPlanningDetailsState.enterState(IPlanningDetailsState previousState)
      This method is called automatically when entering to this state.
      IPlanningDetailsState PlanningDetails.getState() 
      IPlanningDetailsState PlanningDetailsState.leaveState(IPlanningDetailsState nextState)
      This basic implementation does nothing, extend it to perform special actions when leaving this state.
      IPlanningDetailsState IPlanningDetailsState.leaveState(IPlanningDetailsState nextState)
      This method is called automatically when leaving this state.
      IPlanningDetailsState PlanningDetailsState.onActiveWaypointChange(javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<? extends AbstractWaypoint> observable, AbstractWaypoint oldValue, AbstractWaypoint newValue) 
      IPlanningDetailsState IPlanningDetailsState.onActiveWaypointChange(javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<? extends AbstractWaypoint> observable, AbstractWaypoint oldValue, AbstractWaypoint newValue)
      Reacts to a change of the active Waypoint.
      IPlanningDetailsState PlanningDetailsState.onAddWaypoint(AddWaypointAction action) 
      IPlanningDetailsState PlanningDetailsState.onAddWaypointAction(AddWaypointAction action) 
      IPlanningDetailsState DefaultState.onAddWaypointAction(AddWaypointAction action)
      Changes the state of the component to "selecting an intersection".
      IPlanningDetailsState IPlanningDetailsState.onAddWaypointAction(AddWaypointAction action)
      Handles the "add waypoint" user action.
      IPlanningDetailsState AddingWaypointState.onCancelAddWaypointAction(CancelAddWaypointAction action)
      Restore the default state upon cancellation.
      IPlanningDetailsState SelectingWaypointState.onCancelAddWaypointAction(CancelAddWaypointAction action)
      Restore the default state when the user cancels the selection of address for the waypoint.
      IPlanningDetailsState PlanningDetailsState.onCancelAddWaypointAction(CancelAddWaypointAction action) 
      IPlanningDetailsState IPlanningDetailsState.onCancelAddWaypointAction(CancelAddWaypointAction action)
      Handles the "cancel waypoint addition" user action.
      IPlanningDetailsState PlanningDetailsState.onPlanningChange(javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<? extends Planning> observable, Planning oldValue, Planning newValue)
      This method refreshes the view and resets the current state of the list by returning a new DefaultState.
      IPlanningDetailsState IPlanningDetailsState.onPlanningChange(javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<? extends Planning> observable, Planning oldValue, Planning newValue)
      Reacts to a change of the Planning object.
      IPlanningDetailsState PlanningDetailsState.onPlanningWaypointsChange(javafx.collections.ListChangeListener.Change<? extends PlanningWaypoint> listChange)
      This basic implementation simply refreshes the view when list of PlanningWaypoint's changes.
      IPlanningDetailsState IPlanningDetailsState.onPlanningWaypointsChange(javafx.collections.ListChangeListener.Change<? extends PlanningWaypoint> listChange)
      Reacts to a change in the list of PlanningWaypoints in the current planning.
      IPlanningDetailsState PlanningDetailsState.onRemoveWaypointAction(RemoveWaypointAction action) 
      IPlanningDetailsState IPlanningDetailsState.onRemoveWaypointAction(RemoveWaypointAction action)
      Handles the "remove waypoint" user action.
      IPlanningDetailsState AddingWaypointState.onSaveNewWaypoint(SaveDeliveryAddress event)
      Handle the "save" user action.
      IPlanningDetailsState PlanningDetailsState.onSaveNewWaypoint(SaveDeliveryAddress action) 
      IPlanningDetailsState IPlanningDetailsState.onSaveNewWaypoint(SaveDeliveryAddress action)
      Handles the "save new waypoint" user action.
